name: Mango Coconut Smoothie
description: Delicious and refreshing tropical smoothie made with mango, greek yogurt, chia seeds, and coconut milk. Perfect summer treat!

video.name: How to Make Mango Coconut Smoothie (Recipe) マンゴーココナッツスムージーの作り方（レシピ）
video.description:
Delicious and refreshing tropical smoothie made with mango, greek yogurt, chia seeds, and coconut milk.  Perfect summer treat!

For the complete recipe:
http://www.justonecookbook.com/recipes/mango-coconut-smoothie/

Ingredients:

1 banana
1 cup frozen mango (or fresh mango with 5 ice cubes)
¼ cup non-fat Greek yogurt
1 tsp. chia seeds
1¼ cup Silk's Unsweetened Coconutmilk

Music courtesy of Audio Network: "Electronolita"
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Check out my blog: http://www.justonecookbook.com/

recipeIngredient: 1 cup frozen mango ((or fresh mango with 5 ice cubes))

recipeInstructions.text: Put the banana, frozen mango (or fresh mango + ice cubes), Greek yogurt, chia seeds, and coconut milk in an electric blender/mixer or NutriBullet.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the banana, frozen mango (or fresh mango + ice cubes), Greek yogurt, chia seeds, and coconut milk in an electric blender/mixer or NutriBullet.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend until all the ingredients are combined and smooth. Pour into 2 tall glasses.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend until all the ingredients are combined and smooth. Pour into 2 tall glasses.
